title: Skills
text:

title: Academic Projects
text:
Digital Transformation: CRM Implementation
Designed and implemented a CRM system to streamline customer relationship management. Conducted a cost-benefit analysis and created process flowcharts for smooth implementation.
Energy Consumption Prediction (Python)
Analyzed energy consumption datasets using Python, performing data preprocessing and correlation analysis to predict energy usage patterns.
IoT & Blockchain in Agri-Food Supply Chain
Studied the impact of IoT and blockchain on improving transparency and efficiency in Agri-Food logistics, helping to optimize supply chain processes.

title: About Me
text:
Hi, I am Sanjiv Dulal, an experienced IT professional. I bring a strong background in network support, technical operations, and a growing focus on cloud technology and data analytics. Over the years, I have developed a comprehensive skill set in network management, SQL troubleshooting, and performance optimization. Currently, I am pursuing an MBA at University Canada West and expanding my knowledge in emerging technologies such as Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Predictive Analytics.
